item.description: Git is the most widely used version control system in the world, and it is something that every Software Craftsperson should master. In this article, we’ll be going through five git tricks that will make your software crafting easier. Here are the tricks we’ll be covering in this article: Quickly set up Git SSH credentials with GitHub CLI Create a new branch and track it with remote Quickly test changes across branches with the help of stash Split one large branch into multiple Delete a branch from remote Quickly set up Git SSH credentials with GitHub CLI The first thing you want to do before trying out these tricks is to set up git and its credentials.
